column4: how can I get sound? I keep getting told that I can't access the device. I have a sblive and the install detected my tvcard as a mixer as well as some other things....
I want to remove these other detected mixers
do you have the correct module loaded for your soundcard ?
but it see's those others as well
let me explain a little better
no the onboard is disabled and the install detected the TV tuner card as a mixer as well
argh you may have to look to google for help.
you can try adding oss to the /etc/hotplug//blacklist.d/alsa-base file and re-start. That will prevent any oss modules from being loaded for your soundcard  boot time.
I can't wait to see hoary in april. There will be 500 people in irc :D
is this an official ubuntu channel?
well he is obviously very creative, that just shows
